items.title: Under Trump, AI Scientists Are Told to Remove ‘Ideological Bias’ From Powerful Models
items.description: A directive from the National Institute of Standards and Technology eliminates mention of “AI safety” and “AI fairness.”

items.title: Meta Tries to Bury a Tell-All Book
